description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 23/03450/FUL: external materials (3), roof lights (4), cycle parking (8), construction management plan (10) and energy statement (11) in respect of creation of mansard roof to provide 2 self contained flats together with front, rear and side dormers and rooflights and rear balconies.
decision_conditions: The details submitted are sufficient to satisfy the discharge of external materials (3), roof lights (4), cycle parking (8), construction management plan (10) and energy statement (11) conditions of permission ref: 23/03450/FUL and accordingly shall be approved.
